Class AmmoSquare

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.model.map.Square
      • it.polimi.se2019.model.map.AmmoSquare

  • public class AmmoSquare
extends Square
    An AmmoSquare represent a square where a player can grab Ammos, but not spawn
